translations.en:
: ** :fox: After many days without sustenance, you see a dead fox on the side of the road, looking fresh. 

:fork_knife_plate: Try to cook the fox
:walking: Simply ignore it and hurry to the nearest inn
:knife: Butcher the fox and resell its skin.

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is consided a separate choice!*
